alert.note: Alert for Dubois; Orange (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 2:49AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dubois and northwestern Orange Counties through 315 AM EST... At 249 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Jasper to 6 miles southwest of Lynnville. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Orange and Dubois Counties, including the following locations... Dubois, Hillham, Celestine, Millersport, Bretzville, Huntingburg, French Lick, Ellsworth, Duff and Thales. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
